title: Mayank Agarwal:Mayank Agarwal Proves His Vizag Double Ton Was No Fluke, Hits Another Century In The Very Next Match
text:
Mayank Agarwal Proves His Vizag Double Ton Was No Fluke, Hits Another Century In The Very Next Match

Mayank Agarwal Proves His Vizag Double Ton Was No Fluke, Hits Another Century In The Very Next Match

Mayank Agarwal picked up where he left off in Vizag as he hit yet another century in the 2nd Test vs South Africa in Pune. It is his 2nd in the format.

Cricinfo

His century came in 183 balls with 16 fours and 2 sixes. Despite losing Rohit Sharma cheaply, he put on 138 runs for the 2nd wicket with Cheteshwar Pujara (58).

In Vizag he made 215, now he is once again among the runs and certainly making a good case for himself to stay as an opener.

Cricinfo

Don't Miss 312 SHARES 332 SHARES 425 SHARES 204 SHARES

He has certainly provided the perfect base for the big total and it is now up to the rest to build upon it. We are one win away from a record 11th straight series win at home and South Africa are feeling the pressure to turn things around.
